scripts.sync:versions: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const root=process.cwd();const rootPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path.join(root,'package.json'),'utf8'));const version=rootPkg.version;const targets=['apps/admin/package.json','apps/pc/package.json','packages-shared/components/package.json','packages-shared/tailwind/package.json','packages-shared/types/package.json','packages-shared/utils/package.json'];for(const rel of targets){const p=path.join(root,rel);const data=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));data.version=version;fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(data,null,2)+'\n');}console.log('synced versions to',version);"
